sect2.title: Windows
sect2.para: Click on the Uninstall VLC icon that was created during installation

sect2.title: BeOS
sect2.para: Delete the vlc-version directory. You can also remove the configuration file /boot/home/config/settings/vlcrc .

sect2.title: Mac OS X
sect2.para: Drag the VLC application to your trash can .

sect2.title: Debian GNU/Linux
sect2.para: Remove the packages that you installed :

screen.userinput: apt-get remove --purge vlc-gnome vlc-mad libdvdcss2 libdvbpsi1

sect2.title: GNU/Linux Redhat, Mandrake and SuSE
sect2.para: Uninstall the RPM packages that you installed :

screen.userinput: rpm -e vlc-version vlc-mad-version vlc-gnome-version libdvdcss2-version libdvdpsi1-version

sect2.title: If you compiled VLC from sources
sect2.para:
Go to the directory containing VLC sources and execute
# make uninstall
Then you can remove the VLC sources .
